2020-02-25 Version 0.1.1
- Initial publish

2020-02-26 Version 0.1.2
- Ability to override account user with msg.user
- Ability to override account password with msg.password
- Ability to set payload in configuration node that overrides msg.payload.
  Used when there is a specific payload for a selected action regardless of msg.payload
- Fixed flaw in action Remote Syslog
- Updated node information documentation
